headline: A Look At Yum Brands (YUM) Valuation After Mixed Quarterly Results And Post Earnings Share Price Jump
summary: Yum! Brands (YUM) shares have climbed 14.5% after a mixed quarterly report, as EBITDA topped analyst expectations while revenue came in slightly below forecasts. This has put fresh attention on how efficiently the business is running. See our latest analysis for Yum! Brands. The recent post earnings jump sits against a steadier backdrop, with a 90 day share price return of 3.95% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 24.24%. This suggests momentum has been building despite the latest 1 day...

headline: Yum! Brands, Inc. (NYSE:YUM) is favoured by institutional owners who hold 85% of the company
summary: Key Insights Significantly high institutional ownership implies Yum! Brands' stock price is sensitive to their trading...
